pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analysis of Metabolomics Data // Metabolomics data are inevitably subject to a component of unwanted variation, due to factors such as batch effects, matrix effects, and confounding biological variation. This package is a collection of functions designed to implement, assess, and choose a suitable normalization method for a given metabolomics study (De Livera et al (2015) doi:10.1021/ac502439y ).
